mapper.select: SELECT faq_no faqNo, faq_title faqTitle, faq_writer faqWriter, faq_updatedate faqUpdateDate, faq_count faqCount, faq_category faqCategory FROM faq LIMIT #{beginRow},#{rowPerPage}

SELECT faq_no faqNo, account_id accountId, faq_title faqTitle, faq_writer faqWriter, faq_content faqContent, faq_createDate faqCreateDate, faq_updatedate faqUpdateDate, faq_count faqCount, faq_category faqCategory FROM faq WHERE faq_no = #{faqNo}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO faq( account_id, faq_writer, faq_title, faq_content, faq_category , faq_createdate, faq_updatedate )VALUE( #{accountId}, #{faqWriter}, #{faqTitle}, #{faqContent}, #{faqCategory}, NOW(), NOW() )
mapper.update: UPDATE faq SET faq_title = #{faqTitle} , faq_content= #{faqContent}, faq_updatedate = NOW(), faq_category = #{faqCategory} WHERE faq_no = #{faqNo}
UPDATE faq SET faq_count = faq_count+1 WHERE faq_no =#{faqNo}
